Hi there! I'm Israel Morales

Proud husband and dedicated father of two amazing kids. As a software engineer with over 10 years of experience, I'm passionate about building scalable and optimized web applications that deliver incredible user experiences.

I started my journey as a computer science educator, teaching complex topics to competitive students. Today, I continue to educate and empower Latino communities by creating content on YouTube and Instagram, sharing knowledge, and helping others grow in the tech world.

With expertise in tools like React.js, Next.js, and AWS, I'm always looking for new ways to solve problems and create innovative solutions.

Welcome to my space, where technology and a passion for teaching come together.

Progressive Web App (PWA) designed to simplify communication and enhance your professional presence. With features like Call, Text, and Email, it provides direct and effortless contact options for your clients.

The SavvyCard Listing app serves as a real estate search engine tailored for the specific properties associated with the realtor's Person Card.
